thread.title: BRIEF-National Bank Of Canada Announces Specific Share Repurchase Program As Part Of Its Normal Course Issuer Bid

title: BRIEF-National Bank Of Canada Announces Specific Share Repurchase Program As Part Of Its Normal Course Issuer Bid

organizations.name: brief-national bank of canada announces specific share repurchase program

text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - National Bank Of Canada:
* NATIONAL BANK OF CANADA - ENTERED AGREEMENT WITH THIRD PARTY TO REPURCHASE COMMON SHARES THROUGH DAILY PURCHASESâ€‹
* NATIONAL BANK OF CANADA ANNOUNCES SPECIFIC SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM AS PART OF ITS NORMAL COURSE ISSUER BID
* NATIONAL BANK OF CANADA - AGREEMENT TO REPURCHASE WILL TAKE PLACE BETWEEN JAN 15, 2018 AND FEB 6, 2018 SUBJECT TO A MAXIMUM OF 1.5 MILLION COMMON SHARES
